# qernal Provider

Provider used to managed resources within Qernal

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configuration-based authentication
provider "qernal" {
  token = "qernal_token"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token` (String, Sensitive) The token to authenticate with Qernal
